pull.title: travis: Fix caching issues
pull.body:
It appears that the travis caching infrastructure changed under us without any notice. I believe we can no longer use relative paths as cache paths, unless:
* we go back to the root travis build dir before the caching step, or
* we specify absolute paths for caching

Apply both fixes here.

Thanks to **promag** for helping me debug this: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/16148#issuecomment-502078938

issue.title: [port] [travis] fix caching issues
issue.body:
This is a port of bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16214

This is built on top of #1786 and #1787

issue.title: Cherry-pick Travis fix from upstream
issue.body: Cherry-pick https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16214 from upstream. This might solve our Travis issues.

issue.title: [Travis] Show functional tests progress
issue.body:
Backport of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14504, https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14569 and https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15466.
This should help to see which test takes too long or blocks travis when it hangs because of the 50 minutes limit.
